name: Blair the Horror Game (Remastered)
description:
Blair is a horror game in which you are an explorer willing to sacrifice his life to find the secret behind the mysterious missing of the 16-year-old Blair J Smith. However, you find out that she is very much alive and roaming this cellar. Blair doesn't want you to get away with her information. And she will do anything to stop you...

She hears every step you make, every door you open and every book you pick up..... Watch out

If you enjoy the game, leave a review! I will read every review to see what improvements I can make :)
